brief: Set the components of the vector
name: set()
description: Sets the x, y, and z component of the vector using two or three separate variables, the data from a PVector, or the values from a float array.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x component of the vector

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y component of the vector

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: the z component of the vector

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: the x component of the vector

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: the y component of the vector
